values: Dare All Things by the Word of God: John Calvin and His PreachingDare All Things by the Word of God: John Calvin and His Preaching

John Calvin’s life is a demonstration that being mastered by the majesty of God in the word of God produces a ministry of invincible constancy and devotion to expositional preaching.John Calvin’s life is a demonstration that being mastered by the majesty of God in the word of God produces a ministry of invincible constancy and devotion to expositional preaching.
